title: The Education of Henry Adams - "a cold that..."

content.question: The description in "a cold...amusement" primarily suggests that

choices.label: New England residents can easily dismiss hardship in favor of merriment
the nature of New England society breeds a perverse enjoyment of misfortune
the New England weather produces a coldness of character and a profound self-loathing
New England seasonal contrasts produce the capacity to discover a counterintuitive pleasure in adversity

content.answer: New England seasonal contrasts produce the capacity to discover a counterintuitive pleasure in adversity

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Identify and describe details, diction, or syntax in a text that reveal a narrator's or speaker's perspective.
